The server MUST ... ensure that the temporary
credentials have not expired or been used before.

[RFC 5849 section-2.3](http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc5849#section-2.3)
title: Added documentation for save_access_token, temporary credentials must not be reused.

[RFC 5849 section-2.3](http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc5849#section-2.3)
title: Added documentation for save_access_token, temporary credentials must not be reused.

text: Excellent. I think we should take it one step further and add a specific method for this similar to [invalidate_authorization_code](https://github.com/idan/oauthlib/blob/master/oauthlib/oauth2/rfc6749/request_validator.py#L125) that is invoked before returning the access token.
@ib-lundgren I agree - it becomes more explicit and wouldn't make save_access_token do more than its name suggests.
Updated documentation to help users follow RFC5849-2.1. Temporary credentials should not be reused.
